reference.title: Analyze Memory Using MAT dialog
reference.shortdesc: MOTODEV Studio for Android can generate an HPROF file for a selected Android application and then pass it to MAT, the Eclipse memory analyzer. Using MAT you can look for memory leaks and locate areas where your app might be using an excessive amount of memory.

refbody.section: The first step in the memory analysis process is to select the running application to be analyzed. The Analyze Memory Using MAT dialog allows you to do this: select the application's package from the list and click Finish.
